response:
"warum gibt es noch immer unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten ohne unsere zustimmung sammeln und vermarkten? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalerselbstmord"

("why are there still companies that collect our personal data without our consent and sell it? #dataprivacy #privacymatters #digitalsuicide")

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without users' consent, highlighting the importance of data privacy and the need for better protection measures. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy matters), and #digitalerselbstmord (digital suicide) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around data privacy.
